actions.description: 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: 2 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

actions.description:
The Dwarf is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mending, prestidigitation

1st level (2 slots): burning hands, disguise self, shield
actions.name: Spellcasting

specialTraits.description: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage.
specialTraits.name: Dwarven Resilience
